name: Silver Spoon Holiday Ornaments
description:
These unique ornaments are made from antique silver spoons and have a wonderful vintage images embedded inside. 

They make the perfect keepsake gifts or make a beautiful addition to your own festive decor. 

They all come individually packaged in their own lovely organza bag.

name: Fork Tine Ring
description:
Vintage appeal with a modern flair. This delicate and graceful ring has an edgy side. It was fashioned  from a single silver plated fork tine.  

It has a perfectly round shape and is extremely comfortable to wear.  This ring has been buffed to a high shine and smooth finish. 

Definitely a conversation piece, not only for its beautiful shape, but because of its mysterious and  unconventional former life. 

 It is an approximate size 4.75

name: BLING spoon ring
description:
This is anything but your traditional spoon ring. I decided to kick it up a notch and add a little bling!

Made from an antique spoon, it features a beautiful clear crystal rhinestone as the focal point. The stone was adhered to the ring using a cold connection method and will surely stand the test of time. It's a new design, exclusive to Sunshyne Silverwear and has been put through numerous tests to ensure a long life with daily wear.

This ring is an approximate size 8.5. I can resize the ring up or down ONE size. If you need a custom fit, please contact me and I will be happy to do that for you.

name: Spoon Ring with a little BLING!
description:
This is anything but your traditional spoon ring. I decided to kick it up a notch and add a little bling!

Made from an antique spoon, it features a beautiful faux turquoise stone as the focal point. The stone was adhered to the ring using a cold connection method and will surely stand the test of time. It's a new design, exclusive to Sunshyne Silverwear and has been put through numerous tests to ensure a long life with daily wear.

This ring is an approximate size 7.5. I can resize the ring up or down ONE size. If you need a custom fit, please contact me and I will be happy to do that for you.

name: Black Crystal Bling Ring
description:
This is anything but your traditional spoon ring. I decided to kick it up a notch and add a little bling!

Made from an antique spoon, it features a beautiful faux onyx stone as the focal point. The stone was adhered to the ring using a cold connection method and will surely stand the test of time. It's a new design, exclusive to Sunshyne Silverwear and has been put through numerous tests to ensure a long life with daily wear.

This ring is an approximate size 9 but can be resized up or down a bit. Please contact me and I will customize the fit accordingly.

name: Spoon Ring: Silver Plated
description:
An elegant and romantic flatware pattern is featured in this wonderful sterling silver plated band ring. It was hand made out of a handle of a vintage spoon. 
This pattern has an amazing sunflowery pattern.  This is no doubt my most popular pattern to date, but it's rare that I come across it, so grab it up while you can! 
This ring is an approximate size 7. I can re-size this piece up or down ONE size. Please contact me if you need a re-size.

name: Spoon Ring
description:
This elegant ring is made from the handle of a vintage silver plated spoon. 

This pattern, from 1952, is called "Daybreak" It is reminiscent of a royal crown with three beautiful flowers adorning it.

It has been twisted into the traditional "corkscrew" style spoon ring and is an approximate size 7. 

I can customize the fit up or down up to one full size. Please leave a note upon check out as to what size you need and I will be happy to accommodate.

name: Silver Spoon Ring
description:
An elegant and ornate flatware pattern is featured in this wonderful sterling silver plated band ring. It was hand made out of a handle of a vintage spoon. 

This ring is an approximate size 7 but can be resized up or down a bit. Please send me a message upon check out if you need size customization and I will be happy to accommodate.

name: Custom Wedding Rings
description:
Here is a way to get a custom look without the high end price tag.  I will work one on one with you to find the perfect pattern for you and the one you love, then create the rings to the sizes of your choosing. This listing is for both rings. 

I will contact you through the e-mail connected to your Paypal account and once I get an idea of the style of rings you are looking for, I will provide you with pictures of many flatware patterns. You choose the one(s) that best fit your taste. 

The process usually takes 1-3 weeks from initial contact to shipping out your one of a kind treasures.

name: Silverware Bracelet
description:
This gorgeous bracelet was made from the handles of two antique pieces of silver plated flatware.

This pattern, from 1936 is called "Coronation" Its a wonderful filigree style pattern adorned with a bouquet of flowers. 

Like a cherry on top of a sundae, I finished the look of this piece with a beautiful hand crafted glass bead made by local artist Francesca DeCaire. All of her beads are one of a kind, just like the person wearing it. This particular bead is a shiny bright white, perfect to match any outfit! 

I added a lobster clasp at the end for a secure fit. There is also extra chain so the size can be adjusted. These bracelets are one-size-fits-most.

This piece is ready to ship and mails out next business day!

name: Vintage Silverware Bracelet
description:
This gorgeous bracelet was made from the handles of two antique pieces of silver plated flatware.

This pattern, from 1935 is called "Lady Esther" It has an intricate foliage image that resembles a maple leaf. 

Like a cherry on top of a sundae, I finished the look of this piece with a beautiful hand crafted glass bead made by local artist Francesca DeCaire. All of her beads are one of a kind, just like the person wearing it. This particular bead is a bright blue square with rounded edges.  

What an easy way to dress up any outfit! 

I added a lobster clasp at the end for a secure fit. There is also extra chain so the size can be adjusted. These bracelets are one-size-fits-most.

This piece is ready to ship and mails out next business day!

name: Silver Spoon Bracelet
description:
This gorgeous bracelet was made from the handles of two antique pieces of silver plated flatware. 

The pattern, from 1939, is called "Radiance" and for good reason. It's scalloped tip looks like rays of sun, shining over a beautiful garden in bloom. It's one of my very favorite designs. 

Like a cherry on top of a sundae, I finished the look of this piece with a beautiful hand crafted glass bead made by local artist Francesca DeCaire.  All of her beads are one of a kind, just like the person wearing it. This particular bead has an array of wonderful earthy tones. 

I added a lobster clasp at the end for a secure fit. There is also extra chain so the size can be adjusted. These bracelets are one-size-fits-most. 

This piece is ready to ship and mails out next business day!

name: Antique Fork Bracelet
description:
The goal for this piece was to make a striking and modern look from vintage materials. 

This avant-garde bracelet was created from two antique forks. The tines have been bound together with soldered jump rings to ensure a lifetime of wear. 

It fastens in the back with a lobster clasp for a worry free connection and has extra chain to make it adjustable. 

This piece is a one-size-fits-most and is made to order. Please allow 3 business days for completion. Although the bracelet pictured may not be the exact one you will receive, I strive to make each set with the highest of quality and craftsmanship.

name: Tinker Bell Necklace
description:
Did you know that vintage knife handles are often hollow? Cutting the end off makes the perfect little bell! I added a small, star shaped clapper to the inside so the bell has a lovely soft jingle. 

The pattern, from 1939, is called "Radiance" and for good reason. It's scalloped tip looks like rays of sun, shining over a beautiful garden in bloom. It's one of my very favorite designs.

Wear your bell pendant with your favorite chain or for an additional $2.50 purchase an 18 or 24 inch silver plated chain.

options.name: Tinker Bell Pendant with 18 inch silver plated chain
Tinker Bell Pendant with 18 inch silver plated chain

name: Tinker Bell Pendant
description:
Did you know that vintage knife handles are often hollow? Cutting the end off makes the perfect little bell! I added a small, star shaped clapper to the inside so the bell has a lovely soft jingle. 

This pattern, from 1952, is called "Daybreak" It is reminiscent of a royal crown with three beautiful flowers adorning it. 

Wear your bell pendant with your favorite chain or for an additional $2.50 purchase an 18 or 24 inch silver plated chain.

bell pendant with 24 inch silver plated chain

name: In the Vinyard
description:
This little masterpiece was hand cut out of a vintage silver plated serving spoon. 

In the center of this pendant sits a glorious dove. She feasts on grapes in a beautiful vineyard before she takes flight into the blue sky above.

This beauty comes with a 24 inch silver plated chain, free of charge. 

This pendant is made to order. Please allow up to 3 business days for completion. Although the pendant pictured may not be the exact one you will receive, a very similar one will be created for you. I strive to make each one with the highest of quality and craftsmanship. If you have any questions on this piece, please feel free to contact me. I want to make your buying experience everything that you hoped it would be.

name: Spring Has Sprung
description:
This attractive piece has such a wonderful springtime flare. The flattened silver plated serving spoon features a delicate hummingbird sipping nectar from a beautiful field of flowers all cut by hand using a jeweler's saw.  


This piece is made to order. Please allow up to 3 business days for completion. Although the pendant pictured is not the exact one you will receive, a very similar one will be created for you. I strive to make each one with the highest of quality and craftsmanship. If you have any questions on this piece, please feel free to contact me. I want to make your buying experience everything that you hoped it would be.

hummingbird pendant with 24 inch silver plated chain

name: Garden Wonderland
description:
This little masterpiece was hand cut out of a vintage silver plated serving spoon. 

A field of flowers and dancing butterflies give a fine filigree affect inside the spoon. 

This beauty comes with a 24 inch silver plated chain, free of charge. 

This pendant is made to order. Please allow up to 3 business days for completion. Although the pendant pictured may not be the exact one you will receive, a very similar one will be created for you. I strive to make each one with the highest of quality and craftsmanship. If you have any questions on this piece, please feel free to contact me. I want to make your buying experience everything that you hoped it would be.

name: Owls Out Under the Stars
description:
This little masterpiece was hand cut out of a vintage silver plated serving spoon. 

It features two wise old owls sitting in a tree on a warm summers night, looking up to the clear sky filled with stars and a silver crescent moon. 

This beauty comes with a 24 inch silver plated chain, free of charge. 

This pendant is made to order. Please allow up to 3 business days for completion. Although the pendant pictured may not be the exact one you will receive, a very similar one will be created for you. I strive to make each one with the highest of quality and craftsmanship. If you have any questions on this piece, please feel free to contact me. I want to make your buying experience everything that you hoped it would be.

name: Custom Cut Initial Pendants
description:
These pendants are made from flattened silver plated teaspoons.  Each one is carefully hand cut with a jewelers saw to create the letter of your choice. 

There is no gift that is more unique and personal than this hand cut treasure. Whether for yourself or a loved one, these are sure to be a treasured conversation piece for years to come. 

Every pendant comes with a 24 inch silver plated chain and a beautiful organza gift bag. 

Although the samples pictured are not the exact ones you will receive, a very similar one will be created for you. I strive to make each one with the highest of quality and craftsmanship to ensure your satisfaction.

Please allow 1-3 business days for your order to be created.

name: Silver Butterfly
description:
This enchanting piece was hand cut from a flattened silver plated spoon.  The delicate butterfly adornment hangs from two silver plated chains linked from the outstretched wings. 

The butterfly was filed and buffed to a high shine and measures approximately 1.25 inches wide and 1 inch long

This piece is made to order. Please allow 3 business days for completion. Although the necklace pictured is not the exact one you will receive, a very similar one will be created for you. I strive to make each one with the highest of quality and craftsmanship.  If you have any questions on this piece, please feel free to contact me. I want to make your buying experience everything that you hoped it would be.

Sizes available (in total length, including chain):

short = 16 inches (pictured)
medium = 18 inches
long = 20 inches
extra long = 24 inches

name: Always in my heart duo
description:
Want a wonderful way to show someone that they will always be in your heart? How about with this beautiful heart-in-heart pendant duo. 
Made from the same antique silver plated spoon, the hearts were lovingly cut by hand and match up perfectly when brought together. These special pieces come with 18 inch silver plated chains. 

These duos make perfect mother/daughter or best friend gifts.

Although the duo pictured is not the exact one you will receive, a very similar one will be created for you. I strive to make each one with the highest of quality and craftsmanship to ensure your satisfaction.

Please allow 1-3 business days for your order to be created.

name: Bullet Ring
description:
This adjustable ring is made from a recycled bullet casing that has previously been fired. It was salvaged from the Rifle Club of Rochester,NY and has been washed and tumbled to shine up nice and eliminate gunpowder residue. 

Each casing measures about 11mm across and the ring adjusts from a size 7 to about a size 9 

These ring are made to order. Please allow 3 business days for completion. Although the adornment pictured may not the exact one you will receive, a very similar one will be created for you. I strive to make each one with the highest of quality and craftsmanship.

name: Bullet Casing Cuff Links
description:
Here is the perfect gift to give to the hunter or outdoorsman in your life. 

These brass cuff links are made from bullet casings that have previously been fired. They were salvaged from the Rifle Club of Rochester,NY and have been washed and tumbled to shine up nice and eliminate gunpowder residue. 

Each casing measures about 11mm across 

These links are made to order. Please allow 3 business days for completion. Although the adornments pictured may not the exact ones you will receive, a very similar set will be created for you. I strive to make each one with the highest of quality and craftsmanship.

*************************************************

These cuff links also make the perfect groomsmen gifts. Contact me in advance if you would like to order multiple sets

name: Flutter By Cuff
description:
The focal point of this cuff is what used to be an antique silver plated spoon. The image of the majestic butterfly was carefully hand cut with a jeweler's saw onto the flattened spoon and riveted to the leather band.

No animals were harmed for the making of these cuffs, the leather band is made from recycled belts! I attached a snap on the cuff for a secure fit. 

These playful cuffs are made to order. Please allow 3 business days for completion. Although the cuff pictured is not the exact one you will receive, a very similar one will be created for you. I strive to make each one with the highest of quality and craftsmanship. Because all of the cuffs are made from recycled belts, I can only guarantee the color of the belt, not the width. If you have any questions on this piece, please feel free to contact me. I want to make your buying experience everything that you hoped it would be.

sizes: 

small = 7 inches long from snap to snap
medium = 8 inches long from snap to snap
large = 9 inches long from snap to snap

name: Dark Brown Leather Cuff
description:
This cuff is made from the most supple, quality leather and is adorned by perfectly placed nickle plated eyelets 

No animals were harmed for the making of this piece, the band is made from 100% recycled leather! I attached snaps on the cuff for a secure and adjustable fit. 

Specs: band is 1 5/8 inches wide. Snaps are 6 1/2 and 7 1/4 inches apart. 

this cuff is ready to ship today!

name: Leather and Crystal Cuff
description:
This cuff is made from the most supple, quality leather and beautiful faux diamonds accent the black of the leather wonderfully. 

No animals were harmed for the making of this piece, the band is made from 100% recycled leather! I attached a snap on the cuff for a secure fit. 

Specs: band is 3/4 inch wide and had adjustable snaps. The options are 7'' between snaps and 7 3/4'' between snaps. 

*beaded leather wrap bracelets featured in second picture are made by Cloushine Designs: 

https://www.etsy.com/shop/cloudshinedesigns

name: Leather and Turquoise Cuff
description:
This cuff is made from the most supple, quality leather and beautiful faux turquoise stones accent the brown of the leather wonderfully. 

No animals were harmed for the making of this piece, the band is made from 100% recycled leather! I attached snaps on the cuff for a secure and adjustable fit. 

Specs: band is 1 1/2 inches wide. Snaps are 6 1/4, 7 1/8, and 8 inches apart. 

this cuff is ready to ship today! 

*beaded leather wrap bracelets featured in second picture are made by Cloushine Designs: 

https://www.etsy.com/shop/cloudshinedesigns

The focal point of this cuff is what used to be an antique silver plated spoon. The image of the swallow was carefully hand cut with a jeweler's saw onto the flattened spoon and riveted to the leather band.

No animals were harmed for the making of these cuffs, the leather band is made from recycled belts! I attached a snap on the cuff for a secure fit.

name: Through The Keyhole Cuff
description:
Originally a silver plated soup spoon, this utensil was flattened, hand cut with a jeweler's saw, filed then polished and riveted to a leather band. 

The familiar image cut out of the spoon is a traditional key hole. I placed the rivets above and below the cut out to give it the traditional doorknob look. 

No animals were harmed for the making of these cuffs, the leather band is made from recycled belts! I attached a snap on the cuff for a secure fit. 

These cool cuffs are made to order. Please allow 3 business days for completion. Although the cuff pictured is not the exact one you will receive, a very similar one will be created for you. I strive to make each one with the highest of quality and craftsmanship. Because all of the cuffs are made from recycled belts, I can only guarantee the color of the belt, not the width. If you have any questions on this piece, please feel free to contact me. I want to make your buying experience everything that you hoped it would be.

name: LOVE Leather Cuff Bracelet
description:
I got the idea for this image while driving home from a music festival in the summer of 2012.  In front of me, in a traffic jam, was a Honda Civic with a similar bumper sticker.  I finally put the idea into action...introducing my new LOVE cuff. 

A simple rectangle, circle, triangle and square were hand cut out of a flattened silver plated teaspoon.  At first glance it may look to you like the simple shapes we learned on Sesame Street, but look again and the word LOVE will burst out at you.  You will never look at geometric shapes the same way again! 

These nifty cuffs are made to order. Please allow 3 business days for completion. Although the cuff pictured is not the exact one you will receive, a very similar one will be created for you. I strive to make each one with the highest of quality and craftsmanship. Because all of the cuffs are made from recycled belts, I can only guarantee the color of the belt, not the width. If you have any questions on this piece, please feel free to contact me. I want to make your buying experience everything that you hoped it would be.

medium = 8 inches long from snap to snap
large = 9 inches long from snap to snap

name: 13 Point Lightning Bolt Cuff
description:
This cuff bracelet pays homage to the band that set me on the road to freedom through art. The 13 point lightning bolt that all Deadheads know and love was hand sawed out of a flattened silver plated teaspoon and riveted to a leather band.  
Have no fear!! The leather band is made from recycled belts!  I attached a snap on the cuff for a secure fit. 

These heady cuffs are made to order. Please allow 3 business days for completion. Although the cuff pictured is not the exact one you will receive, a very similar one will be created for you. I strive to make each one with the highest of quality and craftsmanship. Because all of the cuffs are made from recycled belts, I can only guarantee the color of the belt, not the width. If you have any questions on this piece, please feel free to contact me. I want to make your buying experience everything that you hoped it would be.

name: Key To Your Heart Pendant
description:
Originally a silver plated soup spoon, this utensil was flattened, hand cut with a jeweler's saw, filed then polished. 

The familiar image cut out of the spoon is a traditional key hole. To make the pendant look even more authentic, I added two aluminum rivets above and below the hole. 

These alluring pendants are made to order. Please allow 3 business days for completion. Although the adornment pictured is not the exact one you will receive, a very similar one will be created for you. I strive to make each one with the highest of quality and craftsmanship.

options.name: key hole pendant with 18 inch silver plated chain
key hole pendant with 24 inch silver plated chain

name: Pie Server Pendent
description:
While working in my studio one day, I found an ornate silver plated pie server that was begging to be made into a pendant.  This lovely piece is the result of a little experimentation. 

The one-of-a-kind pendant hangs from two soldered sterling jump rings and looks just lovely suspended from a silver plated chain.  You can use your own, or add one to your order for just $2.50.

options.name: pie server pendant with 18 inch silver plated chain
pie server pendant with 24 inch silver plated chain

name: Sculpted Fork Pendant
description:
I love this piece because it can be worn with just about every outfit. This sleek silver plated spoon was carefully cut and filed to produce this beautiful shape. All of the edges are rounded and smooth and the silver was buffed to a high shine. 

An expensive look for the budget conscious, this piece was made with durability in mind. 

These lovely pendants are made to order. Please allow 3 business days for completion. Although the adornment pictured is not the exact one you will receive, a very similar one will be created for you.  I strive to make each one with the highest of quality and craftsmanship.

options.name: sculpted fork pendant with 18 inch silver plated chain
sculpted fork pendant with 24 inch silver plated chain

name: Single Fork Tine Pendant
description:
So great for everyday wear, this fork tine pendant will be a staple in your daily ensemble. It's made from a single silver plated fork tine suspended from a soldered silver plated hoop.

the best part about this piece? Its reversible!! On one side is a smooth silky silver and the other has a bit of texture. 

This attention grabber will have all eyes on you, but because they are so lightweight, you will hardly notice you are wearing a necklace at all! 

These charming pendants are made to order. Please allow 3 business days for completion. Although the adornment pictured is not the exact one you will receive, I strive to make each one with the highest of quality and craftsmanship.

options.name: fork tine pendant with 18 inch silver plated chain
fork tine pendant with 24 inch silver plated chain

name: Art Nouveau Earrings
description:
This elegant duo were born from the handles of two vintage spoons. The 1939 pattern is called "Crown Radiance" a name that rightly describes it's beauty. 

The ear hooks are made from sterling silver wire, perfect for those who have sensitive skin. 

These earrings are ready to ship today!

name: Fork tine earrings
description:
Sophistication with an edgy side.  These captivating earrings are made from heirloom silver plated fork tines. The sterling hooks and silver plated hoops are both soldered for durability. 

These beautiful earrings are made to order. Please allow 3 business days for completion.  Although the adornments pictured are not the exact ones you will receive, I strive to make each pair with the highest of quality and craftsmanship.

name: Handle Trio with Real Leaf Skeleton
description:
This exquisite piece is truly one of a kind. Made from three like spoon handles, painted black, it boasts an amazing leaf skeleton lovingly painted white. The leaf was carefully and delicately cut into three sections and adhered to the handles in such a way that when it is worn, all of the leaf's fibers realign.
In between the handles lays two silver colored findings with a border of tiny metal droplets. 
The contrast between the leaf and handles is sure to draw the eye to this stunning piece. 
The necklace is made from smooth stainless steel wire with a screw on clasp that is 17.5 inches round. 

This piece is made to order. Please allow up to 5 business days for completion. Although the necklace pictured may not be the exact one you will receive, a very similar one will be created for you. I strive to make each one with the highest of quality and craftsmanship. If you have any questions on this piece, please feel free to contact me. I want to make your buying experience everything that you hoped it would be.

This piece is also customizable! Contact me if you would like a color combination that is not listed and I would be happy to make you a custom piece.

options.name: Handle trio: black with white leaf
Handle trio: white with black leaf

name: Washer Pendants
description:
These colorful pendants are made from recycled steel washers. They have been hand painted and coated over with a resin to seal in the art.

The beauty of these pieces really shines when the sun catches them. The light reflects off of the metallic background and the pendant explodes with color! 

You can own a piece of the rainbow with one of these lucky charms. 

Each pendant comes with an 18 inch black cotton cord and ribbon necklace, free of charge or for $2.50 more, get an 18 inch silver plated chain.

options.name: Orange and Red Pendant with Silver Plated Chain
Green and Yellow Pendant with 18 inch Silver Plated Chain

name: Boston Strong
description:
One of the oldest cities in the united states, Boston is home to many, many national landmarks and points of interest.  Boston is rich in not only national history, but natural beauty as well.  
Show your love for the "sweet cradle of liberty" with this gorgeous Beantown soup spoon pendant. The skyline was hand drawn and painted in layers giving an amazing three dimensional look. The skyline looks so real, that you can almost hear the cars whooshing by on the street. 

Each pendant comes with a complimentary 18 inch black cord and ribbon necklace with a lobster clasp closure. 

This pendant is available in four options: 

Orange sunset with glow in the dark sun

Blue sky

Grey sky

Purple twilight with glow in the dark moon and "twinkling" foil stars. 

Each piece is made to order, which ensures each on is unique in it's own way and although the pendants pictured are not the exact ones you will receive, a very similar one will be created for you. I strive to make each one with the highest of quality and craftsmanship to ensure your satisfaction.

please allow 1-3 business days for your order to be created.

options.name: Orange sunset with glow in the dark sun
Purple twilight with glow in the dark moon and foil stars

name: Vintage Style Hand Mirror
description:
This hand mirror is truly one of a kind. In keeping with my recycling and silverware theme, an old silver knife serves as the handle on this work of art. The 3 inch round mirror is decorated on the back, with real pressed larkspur and baby's breath and the hand painted Victorian red background gives it an antique feel. A generous layer of resin coat the artwork and protect it, giving the piece a glossy look. A black felt drawstring pouch accompanies this piece, free of charge. 

A throwback to the 50's with a modern flair. Young and old will be able to enjoy this treasure. 

The item has a total length of 6 inches

*Comes with a complimentary fitted black drawstring felt pouch

name: Plains Vista
description:
Made from a recycled soup spoon, this stunning piece pays homage to the beautiful African terrain. The hand painted twilight sky boasts a bright, full moon (which glows in the dark!) and twinkling foil stars. What makes this piece stand out is the amazing three dimensional feel. The hand drawn image of the Acacia tree and the elephant are set on top of the first layer of resin to give depth to the piece. The silhouette actually casts a shadow over the twilight sky. 
A generous coat of resin covers the artwork giving a lustrous look that also protects. 

A complimentary 18 inch cotton and ribbon necklace with a lobster clasp closure come with this piece

This pendant is made to order. Please allow up to 3 business days for completion. Although the pendant pictured may not be the exact one you will receive, a very similar one will be created for you. I strive to make each one with the highest of quality and craftsmanship. If you have any questions on this piece, please feel free to contact me. I want to make your buying experience everything that you hoped it would be.

name: Leaf Skeleton Spoon
description:
This teaspoon is not only a recycled treasure, but a true natural work of art. 
Over the hand painted bright white background, a real leaf skeleton rests.  Painted a deep black to enhance its web-like network of veins, this stunning leaf gets more beautiful the closer you look at it. The generous coat of resin that fills the bowl of the spoon gives a lustrous look that also protects and magnifies. 

A complimentary 18 inch black cotton and ribbon necklace comes with this piece, free of charge or for an additional $2.50, you will receive the 24 inch silver plated chain, as pictured.

options.name: teaspoon pendant with 24 inch silver plated chain

name: Birds on a Wire
description:
This unique piece is truly on of a kind. It features a silhouette of birds on telephone wires.

Layering in this piece gives a three dimensional effect. The birds cast a shadow over the hand painted gray sky. The generous coat of resin that fills the bowl of the spoon gives a lustrous look that also protects.

A complimentary 18 inch black cotton and ribbon necklace comes with this piece, free of charge.

This piece is made to order. Please allow up to 3 business days for completion. Although the pendant pictured is not the exact one you will receive, a very similar one will be created for you. I strive to make each one with the highest of quality and craftsmanship. If you have any questions on this piece, please feel free to contact me. I want to make your buying experience everything that you hoped it would be.

name: Silver Spoon with English Daisies
description:
Embedded inside a beautiful vintage silver plated spoon are two English daisies, still in bloom. 

This piece dresses up a casual look, enhances formal wear and lets not forget to mention, is a great conversation piece! 

This pendant comes with a black 18 inch cotton and ribbon necklace with a lobster clasp closure or for an additional $2.50, get that longer look with a 24 inch silver plated chain.

name: Skyline Baby Spoon
description:
“The Manhattan skyline is like looking at a great work of art; when you’re in the presence of a great work, it is hard to give your attention to anything else.” ~ Maurice A. Hargraves

This miniature cityscape was designed to imitate a snippet of the great New York City skyline. Complete with birds flying high in the overcast sky the three dimensional metropolis almost seems as though  it's its own little world embedded in resin. You can almost hear the beeping of the cars down below. 

Enjoy this piece with a complimentary 18 inch black cotton and ribbon corded necklace, or get the longer look for just $2.50 more and receive a 24 inch silver plated chain.

name: Terrapin
description:
did you know that turtles, in ancient symbolism, represent creation, endurance, strength, stability,and a gentle innocence. They offer protection and good fortune, and are considered sacred in many cultures.
The mythical turtle is a creature of two elements; land and sea and as such she reflects an ability to adapt and flourish in any environment.
Those who bear the symbol of the turtle carry the responsibility of caring for, protecting, and nurturing others.

This lovely piece features a hand painted terrapin with a slightly abstract feel floating over a sage green backdrop. The turtle's scutes are individually and selectively painted different shades of green.

This pendant comes with an 18 inch black cotton corded necklace with a lobster clasp closure.

The mystery and magic of Kokopelli has fascinated people for more than 2,000 years. The humpbacked Flute Player is a mythical Hopi symbol of fertility,replenishment, music, dance, and mischief.

This fun Kokopelli image casts a shadow over the hand painted woodland brown. Layering in this piece gives the feel of depth and the generous coat of resin that fills the bowl of the spoon gives a lustrous look that also protects.

A complimentary 18 inch cotton and ribbon necklace comes with this piece, free of charge or get the longer look for just $2.50 more and receive a 24 inch silver plated chain. 

This piece is made to order. Please allow 3 business days for completion. Although the pendant pictured is not the exact one you will receive, a very similar one will be created for you. name: Rolling In The Deep
description:
If you want to get your jewelry noticed, this is the piece for you. You will either give people who see it a giggle, or get a bunch of strange looks, but if you are like me you know that half of the fun of wearing jewelry is about the reaction to it. 
This funky piece spotlights an octopus tentacle hand painted in a light green and blue over a vivid orange background. 
A complimentary 18 inch black cotton and ribbon necklace comes with this piece, free of charge.

name: Leaf Skeleton Spreading Knife Pendant
description:
This pendant is truly one of a kind. 

Made with an old spreading knife, it has been painted a light grey and enhanced with real leaf skeleton which has been carefully painted black.

The generous coat of resin protects the art and gives a lustrous look. 

An 18 inch cotton/ribbon necklace with a lobster clasp closure come with this piece, free of charge. 

Also available with the 24 inch silver plated chain (as pictured) for an additional $2.50

show off your elegant side with this amazing piece. It's sure to get rave reviews by all who see it.

The generous coat of resin that fills the bowl of the spoon has a lustrous look that also protects.

The generous coat of resin that fills the bowl of the teaspoon gives a lustrous look that also protects and a complimentary 18 inch black cotton and ribbon necklace comes with this piece, free of charge.

name: Perfect for your Baby Shower Favors!
description:
These adorable rubber tipped baby spoon pendants come in a range of colors and all have cute epoxy images or real pressed flowers imbedded in them. Your purchase will include pendants of mixed colors and images. There are many different sets to choose from so that you can adequately accommodate the baby shower you are planning.  

Discounts for larger quantities are built into the prices!

These pendants are made from both brand new spoons and gently used recycled spoons.  

All necklaces come with an 18 inch cotton corded necklace with a lobster clasp closure. 

For every set purchased, free pillow boxes are included. These boxes are stamped with the words 'it's a shower' or an image of baby's feet. Ordering 20 or more? Get a complimentary surprise gift for the mom-to-be! 

***************************************************
These beautiful favors are made to order, they take one week to make, (no matter which sets you order) so keep that in mind when ordering. If you should need a rush on them, please contact me BEFORE you order to make sure that i can accommodate. 
***************************************************
* FREE SHIPPING ON THIS ITEM WITHIN THE UNITED STATES!

name: Spoon Handle: Green and Yellow Polka Dot Feather
description:
This elegant pendant is made from the handle of a spoon. Hand painted a spring green, this pendant boasts a beautiful yellow dyed feather as the focal point.  A generous coat of resin coats the pendant giving it a lustrous look that also protects.

This pendant comes with an 18 inch ribbon cord necklace with a lobster clasp closure.

name: Lupus Awareness Pendant
description:
Lupus is a chronic autoimmune disease that effects 1.5 million people in the US alone. While there are medications available to help treat symptoms of Lupus, (fatigue, joint and muscle pain, skin, heart and lung problems and hair loss are just a few) there is still no cure for the disease. The color purple is reserved for diseases that are considered 'invisible' or rather, you wouldn't know someone has it just by looking at them. Purple has been deemed the official color of Lupus The universal symbol for Lupus is the butterfly. The butterfly describes the shape of the rash that some people living with lupus get. It is also the symbol of beauty, rebirth, transformation, new beginnings, freedom and growth. The spoon symbolizes Christine Miserandino's 'spoon theory' which describes what living with lupus is like.

Odds are, there is someone in your life living with Lupus. Here is your chance to help out a great cause twice. When you purchase this pendant 10% of the retail price goes straight to the Lupus Foundation and now that you know a little about the background of Lupus, wearing your beautiful pendant can help spread awareness about the disease. ************************************************* The image if this beautiful butterfly floats between layers of resin which gives it a wonderful three dimensional quality. The background, hand painted violet, shows the distressed texture of the brushstrokes and giving it a uniqueness all it's own. A complimentary 18 inch cotton and ribbon necklace comes with this piece, free of charge.

name: Rorschach Ink Blot Pendant
description:
This imaginative piece features a classic Rorschach ink blot. 

Originally used by Herman Rorschach as a test in diagnosing psychological problems, to me, it also looks like a work of art. 

Floating over an off white background, the deep black image casts a shadow over the front of the spoon giving a unique three dimensional look and the extraordinary outline of the spoon compliments the shape of the image. 

The generous coat of resin that fills the bowl of the spoon gives a lustrous look that also protects. 

This piece comes with a complimentary 18 inch black cotton corded necklace with a lobster clasp closure, free of charge.

name: Forever Summer red/pink

The generous coat of resin that fills the bowl of the spoon gives a lustrous look that also protects.

description:
This design is reminiscent of the traditional Mehndi henna designs of India.  The intricate design casts a shadow over the sandy colored background. A ruby rhinestone draws your eye to the center of the lotus-like image and gives the piece depth and texture.  The generous coat of resin that fills the bowl of the spoon gives a lustrous look that also protects.

This piece comes with an 18' black cotton cord and ribbon necklace with a lobster clasp, free of charge.

name: Skeleton Key Pendant with Chain
description:

This romantically rustic pendant comes with a 24 inch silver plated chain, free of charge.

Key length is 1.75 inches

name: Gift Certificates
description:
Are you a last minute shopper and need a gift that's personal and unique? Or maybe is it just too hard to choose which silverware creation you think your loved one would like the most. Look no further! These safe, convenient gift certificates can be printed out right in your own home. No waiting days for the mail to arrive, just print and place in a card. Simple as that! Just choose a denomination and you are an your way.

*Gift certificate will be issued to you (the purchaser) electronically in a PDF file by e-mail. (will be sent to the e-mail associated with your Paypal account) From there, you may download it, print it out and place in a card as a gift. A unique code will be issued for each gift certificate. The gift certificate can be redeemed at time of check out online or in person at any of my arts and crafts shows throughout the year.
 
If you would like a hard copy gift certificate mailed to you, please use the "Contact" form to enter your request. All hard copy certificates come with an envelope and are mailed out next business day by USPS first class. 

Your e-certificate should be available in less than one hour from purchase time.
